narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Pre-License inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Pre-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. The applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA for this site.  
 
Once all sites pass Pre-license inspection within 60 days, a copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional 
action on your part. If you have not received your license within 30 days after all sites pass Pre-license inspection, please 
contact the USDA at 970-494-7478. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Eduardo Vivas, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
